name: Pandoc Travis Setup
tagline: Build PDFs from Markdown on TravisCI.
body:
### Purpose
Showcase for an automated process of building PDFs from Markdown files using [Travis](https://travis-ci.org/) + [Pandoc](http://pandoc.org/). The [example document](https://github.com/livioso/pandoc-travis-setup/blob/master/thesis.md) get compiled and automatically committed to the `gh-pages` branch. The compiled PDF is stored in `dist/`.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
